echopype.convert.ek60.ConvertEK60¶

class echopype.convert.ek60.ConvertEK60(_filename='')¶

Class for converting EK60 .raw files.

__init__(_filename='')¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Methods

__init__([_filename]) Initialize self.
append_metadata(metadata, channel, sample_data) Store metadata when reading the first ping of all channels.
load_ek60_raw() Method to parse the *.raw file.
process_sample(input_file, transducer_count) Processing one sample at a time from input_file.
raw2nc() Save data from RAW to netCDF format.
read_header(file_handle) Read header and transducer config from EK60 raw data file.

Attributes

filename
